thread.section_title: Energia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Energia | energia.ie | 3 of 55
thread.title: Joyce

author: Joyce
title: Joyce
text: I'm Very new to energia so can't give much of an experienced opinion, however, it seems good at this time. Definitely more economical than other providers. Would like to have a couple days notice for meter reading before an estimate is made to accomodate possible dates/times not available at a moments notice. Currently, the notice was sent the same day an estimate was made, and the meter read did not qualify when I sent it 2 days after receiving reminder to read meter.
